verbose_text: Semple and co-workers used PEG-lipids (PEG-CerC14) with a smaller C14 lipid anchor to modify liposomes to abrogate ABC phenomenon, which could exchange out of the carrier immediately after injection, with greater than 50% loss of PEG-lipid in approximately 3 min.
evidence: C14 lipid anchor to modify liposomes to abrogate ABC
